string-array.name: tables
string-array.item: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS identifiers ( id INT NOT NULL UNIQUE COLLATE NOCASE, type TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, name TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, PRIMARY KEY (id, type))
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS forms ( form_date DATETIME, timestamp DATETIME NOT NULL, form TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, content TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, obs TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS offline_forms ( timestamp DATETIME NOT NULL, username TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, form TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, json TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, PRIMARY KEY (timestamp))
